text: Operant Conditioning Examples Next to each statement below, indicate whether it is an example of: PR - Positive Reinforcement NR - Negative Reinforcement PUN – Punishment 1. ________ Steve gets special recognition and a reward for turning in a lost wallet. 2. ________ Tarika’s Parents agree to buy her a t-shirt if she gets a good grade on her math exam. 3. ________ The electric seatbelt buzzer stops once your seatbelt is buckled. 4. ________ 4-year-old Cason’s mother puts him in time-out because he was not listening to her instructions. 5. ________ Grounding a teenager until his homework is finished.
